properties.Title: Precautionary Drinking Water Advisory For The Town Of Strasbourg.
properties.Summary:
Description: A Precautionary Drinking Water Advisory has been issued for the Town of Strasbourg. This advisory is for the Town of Strasbourg and for any individuals who may access water from the Strasbourg water system. This advisory is in effect until Wednesday, May 15.
Expires: 2019-05-15T12:00:00-06:00
Originated from CAP Alert: SK Strasbourg, 2019-05-10T09:48:13-06:00, 13FC2163-EDE0-4274-DA2A-908E5AB3C41F
Area: Town of Strasbourg
properties.Author: SK Strasbourg
